lead_paragraph: Outgoing Valencia coach Cesare Prandelli was fiercely criticised on Saturday for "giving up" on the ailing Spanish giants and for looking for excuses to walk out on the team as they hover above the relegation zone.

headline.print_headline: Prandelli Slammed for 'Giving Up' on Ailing Valencia
headline.main: Prandelli Slammed for 'Giving Up' on Ailing Valencia

snippet: Outgoing Valencia coach Cesare Prandelli was fiercely criticised on Saturday for "giving up" on the ailing Spanish giants and for looking for excuses to walk out on the team as they hover above the relegation zone....
